blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: what exactly do you think people want to see from dan and phil? because for me, i dont really enjoy videos that are just “hey...
question: what exactly do you think people want to see from dan and phil? because for me, i dont really enjoy videos that are just “hey sit here with me while i do a random thing!” and it seems like that’s what dnp do a lot. but i just watch bc i like their personalities. but it seems like people are genuinely annoyed with their content. or maybe just phil’s content idk, but dans isn’t superior in any way. they’re both kind of bland and cookie cutter content.
answer: I feel like everyone is going to have a different answer to this. But for me personally, the content I enjoy the most, is like, Jenna or cristine level fuckery. The “I’m here to have fun and do whatever I want and if you don’t like it I’ll see you next week.” Type of content. But I don’t think we’ll ever see that type of content from Dan and Phil, because they don’t have the personalities for it. Phil is an people pleaser resistant to change, and Dan is a perfectionist who sets the bar too high for himself. So Jenna-style content just wouldn’t work for them.

reblog.comment: I feel like everyone is going to have a different answer to this. But for me personally, the content I enjoy the most, is like, Jenna or cristine level fuckery. The “I’m here to have fun and do whatever I want and if you don’t like it I’ll see you next week.” Type of content. But I don’t think we’ll ever see that type of content from Dan and Phil, because they don’t have the personalities for it. Phil is an people pleaser resistant to change, and Dan is a perfectionist who sets the bar too high for himself. So Jenna-style content just wouldn’t work for them.

The “I’m here to have fun and do whatever I want and if you don’t like it I’ll see you next week.” Type of content. But I don’t think we’ll ever see that type of content from Dan and Phil, because they don’t have the personalities for it. Phil is an people pleaser resistant to change, and Dan is a perfectionist who sets the bar too high for himself. So Jenna-style content just wouldn’t work for them.

The “I’m here to have fun and do whatever I want and if you don’t like it I’ll see you next week.” Type of content. But I don’t think we’ll ever see that type of content from Dan and Phil, because they don’t have the personalities for it. Phil is an people pleaser resistant to change, and Dan is a perfectionist who sets the bar too high for himself. So Jenna-style content just wouldn’t work for them.

summary: the mass unsubscribing doesn't make sense to me either. even with the way some people tried to explain it. when Phil was on tour...
question: the mass unsubscribing doesn't make sense to me either. even with the way some people tried to explain it. when Phil was on tour his upload schedule didn't change all that much. if I remember correctly Phil only went 1 month without uploading, then he jumped right back into his "1 or 2 videos a month" routine. there's a youtuber in my country who stopped posting for more than a year and he was still gaining subs even while his channel was totally inactive.
answer:
“2. when he came back, he still continued gaining and his social blade is all green. usually if people are unsubscribing by thousands, it means a youtuber did something fucked up. when Toby Turner was accused of rape, everything that’s been going on with Onision, Lionmaker who turned out to be a pedophile, etc. Phil just uploads normal videos, the only difference is that Dan is out of the picture now. “

“3. one of the main reasons Tyler Oakley started losing so many subscribers was because he pissed people off with this tweet twitter(.)com/tyleroakley/status/791359686758981633 and him turning all extra political on his channel during the American presidential election. with Phil there’s just no serious reason. people simply don’t care and many probably only subscribed because of Dan”

…

Well it’s going to vary creator by creator. With Phil, he’s been around forever, his content hasn’t really ever changed that much, people are just getting bored, I think.

I also heard some speculation that YouTube has been purging inactive accounts and bots, which could account for some of the loss as well.

summary: So if you didn't know, I write Phan smut. If you don't like that, that's okay. I mostly enjoy writing the story leading up to...
body:
So if you didn’t know, I write Phan smut. If you don’t like that, that’s okay. I mostly enjoy writing the story leading up to the smut.

So, if you have any prompts that I can build on, or any requests, I’d appreciate it a lot! Just send them to me via ask if you have any ideas!

I have written:

Murderer AU

Neko AU

Hogwarts AU

2009!Phan

I’ve done one highschool AU but open to more ideas
